subject: p13896515
History: CAD, lightheadedness, nausea, and vomiting, worsening shortness of breath.
Findings: One portable AP view of the chest. Compared to prior study on , there is increased pulmonary edema. There is borderline cardiomegaly. No pneumothorax or focal consolidation. No pleural effusion.
Impression: Increased pulmonary edema compared to. These findings were discussed with Dr. At 2:15 pm. On by telephone.
